description: A family style trattoria has now been converted into these modern premises that, while jealously upholding their homely origin, offer dishes of contemporary inspiration. One small dining hall has an open fireplace and the other gives a panoramic view.
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Car park', 'Garden or park', 'Great view', 'Terrace', 'Wheelchair access']
